description: A response received when publishing a message
title: io.nats.jetstream.api.v1.pub_ack_response

code.description: HTTP like error code in the 300 to 500 range

description.description: A human friendly description of the error

stream.description: The name of the stream that received the message

seq.description: If successful this will be the sequence the message is stored at

duplicate.description: Indicates that the message was not stored due to the Nats-Msg-Id header and duplicate tracking
